meanings.definition: To come up or rise to the surface.
meanings.sent1: The bubbles slowly upcome in the water.
meanings.sent2: The sun will upcome over the horizon in the morning.

meanings.sent4: Hope began to upcome in her heart like a warm sunrise.

meanings.sent5: Laughter always seems to upcome when friends gather.

meanings.sent1: The end of the road upcomes quickly.
